text: The men's 150 metres individual medley at the 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships was held at the National Aquatic Centre in Dublin from 13 - 19 August. 2 classification finals are held in all over this event. ==Medalists== {| |- |S3 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S3 | || 3:36.61 | || 3:47.01 | || 5:03.28 WR(S1) |- |S4 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S4 | || 2:39.95 | || 2:46.13 | || 2:48.54 |- |colspan=7| |- |- bgcolor= e8e8e8 |colspan=7| |} ==See also== *List of IPC world records in swimming ==References== 150 metres individual medley
title: 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships – Men's 150 metres individual medley
